00029 #ifndef STOCHASTICOXYGENBASEDCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00030 #define STOCHASTICOXYGENBASEDCELLCYCLEMODEL_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00033 #include "RandomNumberGenerator.hpp"
00034 
00042 class StochasticOxygenBasedCellCycleModel : public SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel
00043 {
00044     friend class TestSimpleCellCycleModels;
00045 
00046 private:
00047 
00048     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00049     template<class Archive>
00050     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00051     {
00052         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel>(*this);
00053 
00054         // Make sure the RandomNumberGenerator singleton gets saved too
00055         SerializableSingleton<RandomNumberGenerator>* p_wrapper = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance()->GetSerializationWrapper();
00056         archive & p_wrapper;
00057 
00058         archive & mStochasticG2Duration;
00059     }
00060 
00064     double mStochasticG2Duration;
00065 
00071     void GenerateStochasticG2Duration();
00072 
00073 public:
00074 
00078     StochasticOxygenBasedCellCycleModel();
00079 
00083     void InitialiseDaughterCell();
00084 
00088     void Initialise();
00089 
00093     void ResetForDivision();
00094 
00098     double GetG2Duration();
00099 
00104     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateCellCycleModel();
00105 
00111     virtual void OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00112 };
00113 
00114 // Declare identifier for the serializer
00115 #include "SerializationExportWrapper.hpp"
00116 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(StochasticOxygenBasedCellCycleModel)
